com.differ.differcore.controllers

Class DifferController

  • com.differ.differcore.controllers.DifferController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping
public class DifferController

    Main controller of the application.

    By default all requests are mapping to the DEFAULT_URL.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_URL

        @NotNull
public static java.lang.String DEFAULT_URL

        Default url for all requests of this controller.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • Companion

        public static com.differ.differcore.controllers.DifferController.Companion Companion

    • Constructor Detail

      • DifferController

        public DifferController(@NotNull
                        DiffService diffService,
                        @NotNull
                        VersionService versionService,
                        @Qualifier @NotNull
                        Renderer leftRenderer,
                        @Qualifier @NotNull
                        Renderer rightRenderer)

        Is used for autowire required beans.

        Parameters:
        diffService - implementation of interface DiffService interface;
        versionService - implementation of interface VersionService interface;
        leftRenderer - bean with '@Qualifier("leftRenderer")', concrete instance of class Renderer abstract class that renders left column;
        rightRenderer - bean with '@Qualifier("rightRenderer")', concrete instance of class Renderer abstract class that renders right column.

    • Method Detail

      • getFullPage

        @GetMapping
 @NotNull
public java.lang.String getFullPage(@NotNull
                                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                          @RequestParam @Nullable
                                                          java.lang.String old,
                                                          @RequestParam @Nullable
                                                          java.lang.String p)

        Request for a full html page with version differences.

        Params can be null. Then it will search for suitable versions: if old version is null then it will search for penultimate version file; if new version is null then it will search for last version file.

        Parameters:
        old - an old version api for comparison;
        p - a new version api for comparison.
        Returns:
        Whole html page with differences in api versions.

      • getOnlyDiff

        @GetMapping
 @NotNull
public java.lang.String getOnlyDiff(@NotNull
                                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                          @RequestParam @NotNull
                                                          java.lang.String old,
                                                          @RequestParam @NotNull
                                                          java.lang.String p)

        Request only diff part of the html page.

        It useful for ajax requests so as not to reload the page. This params can't be null.

        Parameters:
        old - an old version api for comparison;
        p - a new version api for comparison.
        Returns:
        Only diff part of the html page.
